name: Music_4222.wav
caption: This alternative rock song features a male voice singing in a foreign language. This is accompanied by a percussion playing a simple beat with a compound time signature of 6/8. An acoustic guitar strums chords in the background. An electric guitar plays two note licks. The bass plays the root note and fifth of the chords. The mood of this song is melancholic. This is a moderate tempo song. This song can be played in a movie scene involving a long drive on the highway at night.
